title: Tadej Pogačar Wants First Dauphiné to Reignite UAE Momentum Ahead of Tour de France
content:
After a stunning Giro setback, UAE Emirates-XRG barrels into Dauphiné to remind the peloton who's boss with powerful team to support Pogačar.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Wants First Dauphiné to Reignite UAE Momentum Ahead of Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
